alert.note: Alert for Custer; Fallon; Northern Rosebud; Southern Rosebud (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 13 at 3:15AM MST until December 15 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Periods of moderate to heavy snow. Total snow accumulations between 10 to 16 inches, with the greatest totals south of Interstate 94. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Custer, Fallon, Northern Rosebud, and Southern Rosebud. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility producing periods of whiteout conditions. The hazardous conditions will impact the Tuesday and Wednesday commutes.
info.instruction: Persons should consider delaying travel if possible. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Custer; Fallon; Northern Rosebud; Southern Rosebud
